entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 08:19 AM NDT Monday 27 March 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: N 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or periods of freezing drizzle changing to a few rain showers or flurries this morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Monday 27 March 2023
